articles.author: India Today Science Desk
articles.title: Watch LIVE: Four Axiom-3 astronauts splashdown after 288 orbits around Earth - India Today
articles.description: Ax-3 has been particularly notable for its crew composition featuring government and European Space Agency ESA-sponsored national astronauts and marking several historic firsts in the annals of space exploration
articles.content:
After an epic 18-day voyage in space, encompassing 288 orbits and covering a staggering 7.6 million miles, the Axiom-3 (Ax-3) crew is set to splash down on Earth. 
The four astronauts bid farewell t… [+1292 chars]
